_comment: GitHub PR Review — Engineering Review, Round 2: APPROVED
body:
All issues addressed. ✅

**Checklist Results (Round 2):**
- ✅ Code Tested — API response format fixed, Python note added
- ✅ Explanations Comprehensive — (passed in round 1)
- ✅ Debugging Steps Clear — body parsing section is excellent, the framework-specific examples are exactly what users need

Approved from engineering side. Over to PM.
